question:
Assume you are a professional pharmacist. Please perform structured decomposition of the following drug applicable population description, strictly return according to the following JSON structure:
{
  "type": 3,
  "data": [
     {"gender": "XX","age_range": "XX","age_number": "XX","age_unit": "XX","special_population": "XX"}, ... ]}
Rules:
1. type equals 3 is a fixed value and must exist.
2. Gender value range is male, female, unlimited, no other genders can appear; if both male and female appear, set to unlimited.
3. Age range value range is: ≥, ≤, >, <, =.
4. Age unit value range is: years, months, days.
5. Special population text has a maximum of 1000 characters.
6. The same efficacy component and content structured data is stored as one data object.
7. Remove related modifiers from efficacy.
8. If no result exists, "XX" needs to be replaced with empty string "".
9. Only output JSON data, do not output other content.
Drug applicable population description:
Century Youth Multi-B Vitamin Tablets: People under 17 years old and pregnant women, nursing mothers. Tiancan Vitamin C Chewable Tablets: People under 17 years old, pregnant women, nursing mothers. Weitoli Calcium Plus Vitamin D Soft Capsules: People under 17 years old, pregnant women

gender.description: Gender, male, female, unlimited or empty
